item.title: This $400 Wireless LG Soundbar System Is Only $180 In Best Buy's Early Black Friday Sale
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/this-400-wireless-lg-soundbar-system-is-only-180-in-best-buys-early-black-friday-sale/1100-6527668/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Black Friday is always one of the best times to upgrade your home theater, and this year, we're already seeing some awesome early deals on TVs, speakers, and other gear. One notable offer is for LG's SQC4R 4.1 Channel Wireless Soundbar system, which is $180 (down from $400) in Best Buy's early Black Friday sale.

The soundbar can sync to your TV wirelessly via Bluetooth, or you can hardwire it via auxiliary, optical, or USB cables. It comes with a wireless subwoofer and two wireless rear speakers, all of which communicate with the soundbar via Bluetooth. This 4.1-channel surround sound setup normally costs $400, which is pretty reasonable for a complete setup with these features. The $220 limited-time discount makes this one of the best values we've seen all year on a soundbar setup like this from a major manufacturer. The soundbar measures roughly 26 inches wide, 2.2 inches tall, and 4 inches deep

There are plenty of other great home theater deals in Best Buy's early Black Friday sale. If you need to upgrade your TV, there's a limited-time Doorbuster Deal that drops the 2024 model of Samsung's 75-inch Class DU6950 Series Crystal 4K Smart TV to $550 (was $750) until November 10. While the Doorbuster Deal ends soon, there are other deals in the main sale sticking around longer, including Sony's 65-inch Bravia XR X90L 4K Smart TV for $1000 (was $1,200) and Samsung's 50-inch DU6900 Series Crystal UHD 4K Smart TV for $250 (normally $300).

On the private listening side of audio deals, Best Buy is offering a $100 discount on the superb Bose QuietComfort Ultra Bluetooth headphones, and Amazon is matching this deal.

If you're in the market for a new laptop, Best Buy has some excellent deals on budget options as well as high-end productivity machines. You can even get an entry-level gaming laptop for only $430 (another Doorbuster Deal).

Be sure to check out the rest of Best Buy's Black Friday sale for big discounts on gaming laptops, PC monitors, headphones, and more.

item.title: Get Persona 4 Golden And 7 Other Games For Just $12 At Humble This Month
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/get-persona-4-golden-and-7-other-games-for-just-12-at-humble-this-month/1100-6527636/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

The November lineup for Humble Choice is now live, and this month's selection includes RPGs, Pokemon-likes, and superhero action games. If you're new to this subscription service, Humble Choice costs $12 monthly and offers a bunch of perks, including a monthly batch of PC games that are yours to keep forever, even if you cancel your subscription. Other benefits include exclusive discounts at the Humble store and access to the Humble Vault--an additional rotating library of games exclusive to members.

Humble Choice November 2024 Games

  • Persona 4 Golden
  • Warhammer 40,000: Darktide
  • Cassette Beasts
  • The Lamplighters League
  • The Bookwalker: Thief of Tales
  • Karmazoo
  • Hexarchy
  • Garden Life

The highlight this month is Persona 4 Golden, a 2023 re-release of the classic PS2 game from 2008. This edition includes a ton of new content and gameplay additions to help modernize the experience, and while some elements are a bit dated, it's still a terrific entry in the series that features memorable characters, new locations to explore, and a heck of a mystery at its core.

The other noteworthy game here is Warhammer 40,000: Darktide, a four-player co-op action game that has received major updates since it was first released. It had a troubled launch back in 2022, but developer Fatshark has remained committed to improving the game and the results really do show. Just recently, the studio introduced sweeping changes class and weapon progression, and the game is in a much better state now thanks to various other improvements.

You might have overlooked The Lamplighters League when it came out last year, but this is a good time to check it out as we head into a quieter part of the year. It's a mix of pulp action novels, occult mystery, and fantastical technology, all wrapped up in a rock-solid stealth-action package. For Pokemon fans, you won't want to sleep on Cassette Beasts as this homage to Game Freal's series takes the foundation of pocket monster fun and adds a surprising amount of strategy to the mix. Other cool games you can check out this month include Garden Life, Karmazoo, Hexarchy, and The Bookwalker: Thief of Tales.

Humble Choice members can download the full lineup now. If you're not a member yet, you can join for just $12/month and get immediate access to this month's games, plus all the other membership perks. Like Humble's bundle deals, a portion of all Humble Choice monthly subscription fees is donated to charitable organizations.

If you're looking for more PC game discounts, Humble has a number of bundle deals that get you multiple games at prices far lower than normal. For example, you can grab even horror games for just $20 in the Dark Pictures and Little Nightmares Halloween Collection, or a collection of acclaimed strategy games like Civilization VI, Civilization: Beyond Earth, Sid Meier's Starships, and more with the $20 Sid Meier Collection. Check the list below for all the game bundles currently available at Humble--just keep in mind these are limited-time deals, so grab them while you can.

Humble Game Bundles

  • The Sid Meier Collection
  • Dark Pictures and Little Nightmares Halloween Collection
  • Runescape: Devourer
  • Atari: Recharged Retro Revival
  • Microids Mystery Menagerie
  • House Flipper 2024
  • Generation Zero: The Ultimate Resistance
